Package hms.patient

Class Patient

Object
Patient
All Implemented Interfaces:
User
public class Patient extends Object implements User
Represents a patient in the hospital system. Implements the User interface to provide functionalities such as login, updating personal information, and viewing medical records.

  • Field Details

    • id

      private String id
      The unique identifier for the person.

    • name

      private String name
      The name of the person.

    • dob

      private String dob
      The date of birth of the person (e.g., "YYYY-MM-DD").

    • gender

      private String gender
      The gender of the person.

    • contactInformation

      private List<String> contactInformation
      A list of contact information for the person (e.g., phone numbers, emails).

    • blood

      private String blood
      The blood type of the person.

    • pastDiagnoses

      private List<String> pastDiagnoses
      A list of past diagnoses for the person. Contains the details of all past medical conditions.

    • pastTreatments

      private List<String> pastTreatments
      A list of past treatments provided to the person. Contains the details of all treatments the person has received.

    • password

      private String password
      The password for the person's account.

    • role

      private String role
      The role of the person (e.g., "Doctor", "Patient").

    • loginStatus

      public static Map<String,Boolean> loginStatus
      Static map to track the login status of patients. Key: Patient ID, Value: true if first login, false otherwise.

  • Constructor Details

    • Patient

      public Patient()
      Default constructor.

    • Patient

      public Patient(String id, String name, String dob, List<String> ci, String gender, String blood, List<String> pd, List<String> pt)
      Constructor to initialize a patient object.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the patient.
      name - The name of the patient.
      dob - The date of birth of the patient.
      ci - The contact information of the patient (email and phone).
      gender - The gender of the patient.
      blood - The blood type of the patient.
      pd - The past diagnoses of the patient.
      pt - The past treatments of the patient.

    • updatePersonalInformation

      public void updatePersonalInformation(String phone, String email, List<Map<String,String>> patientList)
      Updates the patient's contact information in the system.
      Parameters:
      phone - The updated phone number (or "no" to keep unchanged).
      email - The updated email (or "no" to keep unchanged).
      patientList - The list of patient records to update.

      Displays the patient's medical record, including personal and medical details.
